org.ff4j.property.store

Class AbstractPropertyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.property.store.AbstractPropertyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InMemoryPropertyStore, JdbcPropertyStore, KeyValuePropertyStore

    public abstract class AbstractPropertyStore
extends Object
implements PropertyStore
    Superclass for any property store.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
